channel.title: Leveling (Aryan)
channel.description: I dont understand why and how people level using Aryan? :rolleyes: Dont you get banned within a week, therefore what good is an autofighter or a pure powerminer untill 85 mining? If you can do this and stay unbanned or unbanned for a while, could you post it here or PM me if you dont want everyone knowing? Are you just using normal Aryan? Thx, bye.

item.title: Leveling (Aryan)
item.dc:creator: @anony2 anony2
item.description:
@anony2 wrote:

pistol get him unbanned

il post showing what retards jagex is and how to get your char unbanned

First what Jagex sent me

Hi --------,

We regret to inform you that this account has been identified as breaking our rules on macro usage.

Please refer to the Rules of conduct -

Rule 7: You must not attempt to use other programs (e.g. bots, macros or autominers) in conjunction with our games to give yourself an unfair advantage at the game. You also may not circumvent any of our mechanisms designed to log out inactive users automatically.

Please see the Macro FAQ in the FAQ section of the RuneScape website for more details on our macro policy.

As a result of this recent offence, and in light of your previous record, your account has been permanently banned.

If you feel you have been banned in error, you may appeal once. For the appeal to be successful you will need to explain why the ban should be lifted, and will need to convince us there wont be any further problems with this account.

To make an appeal please do so using the Ban Appeal section of the Customer Support area of the RuneScape website.

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support

now what i sent jagex

On 19th March 2006, you sent us the following:

From what i understand it is IMPOSSIBLE to auto in Runescape, therefore i dont understand how i could be banned for “autoing” i have played this game for a long time and i dont know if i can live with the fact that my hard work will be gone i should take my life with my 44 magnum i should point the cold pistol in my mouth and pull the trigger ending it all, its a possibility

now what jagex sent me back READ IT ALL

Dear -------,

Thank you for your appeal.

We regret to inform you that this account has been banned because of Macroing.

Please refer to article number 7 in the Rules of Conduct:

Rule 7: You must not attempt to use other programs (e.g. bots, macros or autominers) in conjunction with our games to give yourself an unfair advantage at the game. You also may not circumvent any of our mechanisms designed to log out inactive users automatically.

We do not discuss our detection process with anyone, to do such would give auto/macro users information to help them avoid detection. For all the details on our macro detection that we are willing to give out please read the Macro FAQ, which can be found by selecting the link titled ‘Explore the knowledge base’ under the ‘Knowledge Base’ section on the main page of our website (www.runescape.com).

We are 100% confident in our macro detection systems, and in the highly trained staff who monitor and take action based on the results presented by these systems, and as such are 100% confident that you have been using such a program.

In normal circumstances this would result in the permanent removal of your account from the game, however upon reviewing your history we have decided to place you on a temporary 7 day ban instead.

Please be aware that your account now has 3 Black Marks and that we will be monitoring the activities of your account closely. Any further breaches of the Rules of Conduct will result in your account being permanently removed from the game.

The usage of these programs ruins the game for honest players and is not how the game has been designed to be played. We will not tolerate a minority of players using these programs to achieve by computer what fair players have accomplished through honest hard work and game play.

Your ban will be lifted on the 28th March 2005.

We strongly suggest that you take the time to make yourself familiar with our Rules of Conduct, which can be found in the ‘Knowledge Base’ section of www.runescape.com, before returning to play.

Yours Sincerely
Mod Terry
RuneScape Customer Support

see it works just send something like that and get it unbanned…doesnt always work but its worth a shot

Read full topic

item.title: Leveling (Aryan)
item.dc:creator: @Angelohavoc Angelohavoc
item.description:
@Angelohavoc wrote:

ive been using aryan for the past… say… 4 months off and on, made about 18m off ess, and about 9m off of willows

Every once in a while, my miner or cutter gets banned, or my mule gets banned, sets me back a little, but i just pick right back up and try again

Woodcutters: 30 minutes to get from 1-30 wc, then 1 day to get frmo 30-60 wc, then cut yews or stay on willows

Miners: /tutIsland, /runeMyst(), /imp_em() - 2 days to level 38 mining, and thats barely even mining, if you make it to 60 mining all autoing, you will get banned because you show up on highscores and they can see you xD (my theory)

I had a miner who got 100 xp from 60 mining, then i stopped autoing and mined 5 coals, then the next day i was banned

Read full topic
